ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( ClusterLookup__c ) && PRIORVALUE(ClusterLookup__c )<> "" && $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'Site Head', $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
